    Starting with a Controlled Vocabulary

    starting-with-convo.Rmd
    library(convo)

    Reading in from YAML

    filepath <- system.file("", "vocab-rideshare-2.yml", package = "convo")
convo <- read_convo(filepath)
    - level: 1
  desc: The type layer
  req: Y
  stubs:
    - stub: ID
      desc: Unique identifier
      valid:
        - col_exists()
        - col_vals_not_null()
        - col_is_numeric()
        - col_vals_between(1000, 99999)
    - stub: IND
      desc: Binary indicator
      valid:
        - col_is_numeric()
        - col_vals_in_set(c(0,1))
    - stub: AMT
      desc: Non-negative, summable quantity
      valid:
        - col_is_numeric()
        - col_vals_gte(0)
    - stub: VAL
      desc: Value
      valid:
        - col_is_numeric()
    - stub: CAT
      desc: Category
      valid:
        - col_is_character()
    - stub: CD
      desc: System-generated code
      valid:
        - col_is_character()
    - stub: DT
      desc: Calendar date in YYYY-MM-DD format
      valid:
        - col_is_date()
- level: 2
  req: Y
  desc: The entity layer
  stubs:
  - stub: DRIVER
    desc: Ridershare driver
  - stub: RIDER
    desc: Ridershare passenger
  - stub: TRIP
    desc: Complete trip (request to arrival)
  - stub: ORIG
    desc: Initial position
  - stub: DEST
    desc: Final position
  - stub: COST
    desc: Financial burden
- level: 3
  req: N
  stubs:
  - stub: CITY
    desc: City name
  - stub: ZIP
    desc: Five digit zip code
  - stub: LAT
    desc: Latitude
  - stub: LON
    desc: Longitude
  - stub: DIST
    desc: Distance in miles
  - stub: TIME
    desc: Time in minutes
  - stub: RATE
    desc: Rating on five star scale

    Creating in R

    Define a list

    my_convo <- list(list("a", "b"), list("c", "d"), list("e", "f"))
my_convo
#> [[1]]
#> [[1]][[1]]
#> [1] "a"
#> 
#> [[1]][[2]]
#> [1] "b"
#> 
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [[2]][[1]]
#> [1] "c"
#> 
#> [[2]][[2]]
#> [1] "d"
#> 
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [[3]][[1]]
#> [1] "e"
#> 
#> [[3]][[2]]
#> [1] "f"

    Append class convomin

    class(my_convo) <- c("convomin", class(my_convo))
my_convo
#> Level 1
#> - a
#> - b
#>  Level 2
#> - c
#> - d
#>  Level 3
#> - e
#> - f

    Use to create YAML template

    tmp <- tempfile("convo", fileext = ".yml")
write_convo(my_convo, filename = "convo-config.yml", path = tempdir())
    - desc: ~
  req: ~
  stubs:
  - stub: a
    desc: ~
    valid: ~
  - stub: b
    desc: ~
    valid: ~
- desc: ~
  req: ~
  stubs:
  - stub: c
    desc: ~
    valid: ~
  - stub: d
    desc: ~
    valid: ~
- desc: ~
  req: ~
  stubs:
  - stub: e
    desc: ~
    valid: ~
  - stub: f
    desc: ~
    valid: ~
